overview: Tommy is making out with the barely-clothed Alli when she blindfolds him and tells him that she has a surprise waiting. • Kimmy arrives home with her boyfriend Johnny. The couple is ready for a hot time, but when Kimmy goes to her room she finds her roommate Aidra passed out naked in her bed! • Brunettes Kiera and Veronica circle their man Van, sizing him up before they come together in front of him. • Van is having a sexy photo shoot with Kimmy and Jillian. When his two models start getting naughty and peeling off their clothes, Van keeps on snapping shots with a smile that demonstrates that he knows the pleasure to come. • Blonde babes Chloe and Hayden exchange a kiss before they are joined by their man Van.
title: Sharing
